Events.Text: Hello, can you help me schedule an appointment with Dr. Morgan?
Can I have your name please? What day and time would you like and what symptoms are you experiencing?
Can I have your name please? What day and time would you like and what symptoms are you experiencing?
Mark, Thursday at 9 pm, runny nose, sneezing, and a general lack of energy.

Constraints.Symptoms: " runny nose, sneezing, and a general lack of energy"

Item.Message: The doctor has a conflicting appointment at that time. Try another time or another doctor.

PrimaryItem.Message: The doctor has a conflicting appointment at that time. Try another time or another doctor.
The doctor has a conflicting appointment at that time. Try another time or another doctor.

Events.Text: Unfortunately Dr. Morgan has no appointment available at 9 pm.
Darn, thanks for trying anyway, good bye.

PrimaryItem.Message: The doctor has a conflicting appointment at that time. Try another time or another doctor.
The doctor has a conflicting appointment at that time. Try another time or another doctor.

Scenario.UserTask: You are Mark and would like to make an appointment with Dr. Morgan for Thursday at 9 pm. Your symptoms are runny nose, sneezing, and a general lack of energy. If no appointment can be made, just say goodbye.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user book a doctor appointment!

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
